birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省红安县
birth_place.en: Hong'an County, Hubei, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第十二届全国政协常委、中国人民对外友好协会会长。她是李先念的女儿，刘亚洲的妻子。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former member of the Standing Committee of the 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, and President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. She is the daughter of Li Xiannian and the wife of Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在邓小平执政时期曾任中华人民共和国主席和全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference during Deng Xiaoping's administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，李小林的丈夫。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army Air Force and husband of Li Xiaolin.

nodes.id: 中国人民对外友好协会

zh-cn: 中国人民对外友好协会
en: Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会
en: 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾是中华人民共和国的实际最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician who was the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席
en: Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 一种研究生学位。
description.en: A postgraduate academic degree.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，接替李小林担任中国人民对外友好协会会长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who succeeded Li Xiaolin as the President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，李小林的前任中国人民对外友好协会会长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Li Xiaolin as the President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries.

description.zh-cn: 李小林是李先念的女儿。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the daughter of Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 李小林是刘亚洲的妻子。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the wife of Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 李小林出生于中华人民共和国湖北省红安县。
description.en: Li Xiaolin was born in Hong'an County, Hubei, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李小林毕业于北京景山学校。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is an alumna of Beijing Jingshan School.

description.zh-cn: 1972年4月到1975年9月，于武汉大学学习。
description.en: Studied at Wuhan University from April 1972 to September 1975.

description.zh-cn: 在美国加州大学洛杉矶分校学习美国历史，取得硕士学位。
description.en: Studied American History at the University of California, Los Angeles, and obtained a Master's degree.

relationships.target: 中国人民对外友好协会

position.en: Chief of the Department of American and Oceanian Affairs

description.zh-cn: 自1975年起任中国人民对外友好协会美大处处长。
description.en: Served as Chief of the Department of American and Oceanian Affairs of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries since 1975.

relationships.target: 中国人民对外友好协会

description.zh-cn: 于2011年9月至2020年4月9日，担任中国人民对外友好协会会长、党组书记。
description.en: Served as President and Party Group Secretary of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries from September 2011 to April 9, 2020.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会常务委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平执政时期曾经出任中国国家主席。
description.en: Served as the President of the People's Republic of China during Deng Xiaoping's administration.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平执政时期曾经出任全国政协主席。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference during Deng Xiaoping's administration.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲是中国人民解放军空军上将。
description.en: Liu Yazhou is a General in the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 2015年9月，陪同中华人民共和国领导人习近平访问美国。
description.en: In September 2015, accompanied Chinese leader Xi Jinping on his visit to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 陈昊苏是李小林在中国人民对外友好协会会长职位上的前任，李小林于2011年9月接任该职务。
description.en: Chen Haosu was Li Xiaolin's predecessor as President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, a position Li took over in September 2011.

description.zh-cn: 2020年4月9日，李小林卸任中国人民对外友好协会会长，由林松添接任。
description.en: On April 9, 2020, Li Xiaolin stepped down as President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and was succeeded by Lin Songtian.
